You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &iogon;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Iogon;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/012e/index.htm U+0012E].
  * `&iogon;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/012f/index.htm U+0012F].
